===CSVDict===
* Create a static CSVDict for a relatively large CSV files.
{{{
    private static CSVDict stationInfo;
    
    public CSVDict getStationInfo(File stationInfoCSVFile)
        throws SmfException
    {
        if (stationInfo == null) {
            try {
                stationInfo = new CSVDict(stationInfoCSVFile.getAbsolutePath(), ',', 0);
            } catch (CSVDictException csvde) {
                throw new SmfException(csvde);
            }
        }
        return stationInfo;
    }
  
}}}
